title: LOL Riot bans me and doesnt tell me why WTF
body:
LMAO


Why am i banned for? Its not toxicity because i would of got chat restricted.... I just legit got perma banned and riot sends me a email telling me i broke a rule or someshit and linked me the terms of use lmao.....

replies.body:
Hey there,

Your best bet as this is an account specific inquiry would be to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new), we here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.

My partner has played the game since early seasons and you have permanently suspended his account that he has invested over $500 in because he forgot to turn off macros from Ark in 3 arams games. we both love it and have invested thousands of hours and $$ but cannot support this kind of action. Surely an accidental not turning off of macros can't result in a PERMANENT suspension.
i have legit never ever used a software or scripted before i dont even know how .... WHY RIOT WHY
